\usepackage{xcolor}

\definecolor{wongBlue}{RGB}{0, 114, 178}
\definecolor{wongOrange}{RGB}{213, 94, 0}
\definecolor{wongPurple}{RGB}{204, 121, 167}
\definecolor{gris}{HTML}{949698}

\definecolor{rcp60}{RGB}{222, 99, 43}

\newcommand*\grasO[1]{\textbf{\textcolor{wongOrange}{#1}}} 
\newcommand*\grasG[1]{\textbf{\textcolor{wongGreen}{#1}}} 
\newcommand*\grasB[1]{\textbf{\textcolor{wongBlue}{#1}}} 
\newcommand*\grasLB[1]{\textbf{\textcolor{wongLightBlue}{#1}}} 
\newcommand*\grasJ[1]{\textbf{\textcolor{wongGold}{#1}}} 
\newcommand*\grasP[1]{\textbf{\textcolor{wongPurple}{#1}}}

\newcommand{\highlight}[2]{\colorbox{#1!17}{#2}}

\newcommand{\highlightorange}[1]{\highlight{wongOrange}{\grasO{#1}}}
\newcommand{\highlightgreen}[1]{\highlight{wongGreen}{\grasG{#1}}}
\newcommand{\highlightblue}[1]{\highlight{wongBlue}{\grasB{#1}}}
\newcommand{\highlightlightblue}[1]{\highlight{wongLightBlue}{\grasLB{#1}}}
\newcommand{\highlightgold}[1]{\highlight{wongGold}{\grasJ{#1}}}
\newcommand{\highlightpurple}[1]{\highlight{wongPurple}{\grasP{#1}}}
\newcommand{\highlightgris}[1]{\highlight{gris}{\grasGris{#1}}}

\newcommand*\important[1]{\textbf{\textcolor{wongGreen}{#1}}}
\newcommand{\highlightimportant}[1]{\highlight{wongGreen}{\important{#1}}}

\newcommand*\subimportant[1]{\textbf{\textcolor{wongBlue}{#1}}}
\newcommand{\highlightsubimportant}[1]{\highlight{wongBlue}{\subimportant{#1}}}
